column2: I will repay the gold that I owe the [jewish.GetName] moneylenders.
I will repay the gold that I owe the [jewish.GetName] moneylenders.
I can borrow 600¤ from Jewish merchants and moneylenders living in the realm. With the interest agreed upon, I will owe them 750¤ to be paid back at my convenience.
I can borrow 800¤ from Jewish merchants and moneylenders living in the realm. With the interest agreed upon, I will owe them 1000¤ to be paid back at my convenience.
